sentences.english: It's become a Chinese custom for many familes to watch the CCTV New Year Gala while having their dinner.
sentences.chinese: 吃年夜饭看春晚已经成为很多中国家庭的习俗。

sentences.english: New Year's Eve is the time for family reunion.
sentences.chinese: 除夕之夜，迟一顿丰富年夜饭，是家人团聚的时候。

sentences.english: Parents keep busy preparing the New Year's Eve dinner and making jiaozi—dumplings with meat and vegetable fillings.
sentences.chinese: 父母忙着准备年夜饭，包饺子肉和蔬菜做馅的饺子。

sentences.english: We had dumplings made by the whole family for dinner on lunar New Year's Eve ere.
sentences.chinese: 全家人聚在一起吃年夜饭是多么幸福的事情。

sentences.english: After dinner, all the family stays up late to welcome the New Year.
sentences.chinese: 在新年前夕，大家爱购置年货，米西年夜饭。

sentences.english: It is really a pain, you know?
sentences.chinese: 做年夜饭是非常费事的，你知道吗？

sentences.english: Ha ha, however I made out the menu of the dinner on new year's eve with my parents yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 呵呵，昨天还是缠着他们把年夜饭的菜谱搞定了。

sentences.english: On the Eve of Chinese New Year, supper is a feast with families. The family will end the night with firecrackers.
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜，家人会一起吃年夜饭，过年时会放鞭炮。

sentences.english: Yes, It's really woderful, We can go to let off fireworks after the reunion dinner.
sentences.chinese: 是的，的确很漂亮，我们吃完年夜饭可以去放烟火。

sentences.english: The dinner is regarded as the most expensive reunion dinner in China, the Singapore-based Lianhe Zaobao reported Monday.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡《联合早报》报道称，该年夜饭可谓中国最贵。

sentences.english: While having the family reunion dinner on Lunar New Year’s Eve, I got lots of red envelops from my elders.
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜，吃年夜饭时，我的长辈给我许多红包。

sentences.english: Gabriella invited Jordan to enjoy New Year's Eve dinner together.
sentences.chinese: 加布里盖儿邀请乔丹一起吃年夜饭。

sentences.english: A large family around on the kang, desk in the middle of the are preparing to eat meal.
sentences.chinese: 一大家人围着放在炕中间的桌子正准备吃年夜饭。

sentences.english: We usually have fish for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 年夜饭我们通常要吃鱼。

sentences.english: A Sweet Dinner with Family or A Romantic Dinner Full of Love?
sentences.chinese: 与家人的温馨年夜饭还是情人节浪漫之夜？

sentences.english: Eve is also called the reunion meal.

definition: (of a family) to come together at lunar New Year's Eve/family reunion at New Year's
to celebrate the Chinese New Year
last day of the lunar year/Chinese New Year's Eve
Spring Festival atmosphere/festive ambiance of Chinese New Year
merchandise sold for Chinese New Year
last day of the lunar year/Chinese New Year's Eve
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
